Sono Matteo Flora e qui scrivo.

Come innovatore, imprenditore e lifehacker.

4chan kills...

Pekka-Eric Auvinen: Humanity is overrated.

His photo and a message that he would “kill people at jokela high school today in the name of anonymous” was posted on the image board 4chan the same day. It however has been stated by the Finnish police that they could not find a connection between Auvinen and “Anonymous”.

E se volete tenere gli high-score c’è chi lo ha già fatto.
